raw:
{{Infobox armor poe2
| name              = Magnera's Chain
| icon              = poe2 mail_armor_principi icon.png
| description       = The outlaw hero Magnera Freetrader wore this suit of mail when she mounted her legendary assault on the prison in Helsgate to rescue her imprisoned husband from the clutches of a corrupt Dyrwoodan bailiff. Magnera faced the entirety of the prison garrison, fighting her way from the gates to the dungeon tower where the bailiff himself stood between the her and her husband's cell.

The two engaged in a ferocious duel of sabres. The warden, though skilled, was no match for Magnera. His many glancing blows failed to penetrate her chainmail. He could do nothing more than curse the outlaw's name as she cut him down.
| added_in          = poe2
| equipment_slot    = Armor
| armor_type        = Mail armor
| armor_category    = Medium armor
| requirements      = 
| is_soulbound      = no
| is_unique         = yes
| value             = 3040
| shop_value        = 15200
| recovery_speed    = +35%
| dr_base           = 10
| dr_crush          = 8
| dr_pierce         = 12
| dr_slash          = 
| dr_burn           = 
| dr_corrode        = 
| dr_freeze         = 8
| dr_shock          = 
| armor_bonuses     = Superb armor (Deadfire){{!}}Superb;Blade-Biting;Riveted Links
